      static final int PLAYERONE_CHOOSING
      This state means that at this time the player one is blocked by other obstacles and should choose to move left/move right/skip the turn.

      Obstacles include: other players, board edges, fire, tar pits, fences

    • playerOneStuck

      public boolean playerOneStuck
      True represents player one being stuck in the tar pit. Player one will miss the next turn.

    • playerTwoStuck

      public boolean playerTwoStuck
      True represents player two being stuck in the tar pit. Player two will miss the next turn.

  • 方法详细资料

    • isFire

      public boolean isFire(double layoutX, double layoutY)
      Determine if this square is fire

      Fire is a common obstacle, the player can not enter the fire, need to go around the way forward.

      参数:
      layoutX - Player's x coordinate
      layoutY - Player's y coordinate
      返回:
      true - fire, false - not fire

    • isTarPit

      public boolean isTarPit(double layoutX, double layoutY)
      Determine if this square is tar pit

      Tar pits are accessible obstacles. If a player passes through a tar pit, he or she will be stuck. This player will skip the next turn.

      参数:
      layoutX - Player's x coordinate
      layoutY - Player's y coordinate
      返回:
      true - tar pit, false - not tar pit

    • isFence

      public boolean isFence(double layoutX, double layoutY)
      Determine if this square is fence

      A fence is an obstacle that covers two square spaces, the player can not enter the fence, need to go around the way forward.

      参数:
      layoutX - Player's x coordinate
      layoutY - Player's y coordinate
      返回:
      true - fence, false - not fence

    • isOtherPlayer

      public boolean isOtherPlayer(Gamer player, double layoutX, double layoutY)
      Detect if there is another player in this square
      参数:
      player - another player (not the moving player)
      layoutX - x-coordinate of the moving player
      layoutY - y-coordinate of the moving player
      返回:
      true - Another player in this square, false - not

    • isEdge

      public boolean isEdge(double layoutX, double layoutY)
      Detect if the player is now outside of board
      参数:
      layoutX - Player's x coordinate
      layoutY - Player's y coordinate
      返回:
      true - outside, false - not outside

    • isFinishArea

      public boolean isFinishArea(double layoutX, double layoutY)
      Detect if the player is now in the winning area
      参数:
      layoutX - Player's x coordinate
      layoutY - Player's y coordinate
      返回:
      true - in the winner area, false - not

    • move

      public void move(Gamer player, DirDice dirDice, MoveDice moveDice)
      The core logical method to forward or backward movement

      Step1: The player gets the "ideal" number of squares moved as determined by dice, execute this method

      Step2: Each step must be judged whether this square is obstacle. So this method will be executed several times.

      - If it is another player/fire/fence/edge of the board, player will stop, ending the method and the remaining moves will be stored. If this one is player 1 / 2, state will be updated to PLAYERONE_CHOOSING / PLAYERTWO_CHOOSING. Player 1 or Player 2 should choose to move left/move right/skip the turn.

      - If it's a tar pit, the player will get stuck in it and skip the next turn. End method. If this one is player 1 / 2 who is stuck, state will be updated to PLAYERTWO_DICE / PLAYERONE_DICE.

      - If everything is fine, then the player will move

      参数:
      player - the moving player
      dirDice - The moving player's dice that determine the direction of movement
      moveDice - The moving player's dice that determine the number of squares moved

    • moveLeftOrRight

      public boolean moveLeftOrRight(Gamer player, DirDice dirDice, MoveDice moveDice, int leftOrRight)
      The core logic method when a player encounters an obstacle (other player/edge of the board/fire/fence)

      This method is executed when the "left" or "right" button is clicked and the state is PLAYERONE_CHOOSING or PLAYERTWO_CHOOSING.

      Each step must be judged whether this square is obstacle. So this method will be executed several times. The player will stop in front of any obstacle (including tar pits).

      Whether the player consumes all the "ideal" moves or stops in front of an obstacle, end the method. And update the state to PLAYERONE_DICE or PLAYERONE_DICE in ArchitectureController.playerOneLeft(ActionEvent) or ArchitectureController.playerOneRight(ActionEvent) or ArchitectureController.playerTwoLeft(ActionEvent) or ArchitectureController.playerTwoRight(ActionEvent).

      参数:
      player - the moving player
      dirDice - The moving player's dice that determine the direction of movement
      moveDice - The moving player's dice that determine the number of squares moved
      leftOrRight - -1 is for left, 1 is for right. Because the x coordinate decreases when moving to the left
      返回:
      true - normal moving, false - met with an obstacle

    • playerOneDir

      public void playerOneDir()
      Player 1 throws a die to obtain the direction of movement.

      Step1: Player 1 throws the dice. If the result is not `miss`, the state is updated to PLAYERONE_MOVE.

      Step2: If the result is `miss`

      - If player 2 is stuck in the tar pit, update state to PLAYERONE_DICE.

      - Otherwise, the state is updated to PLAYERTWO_DICE.

    • playerOneMoveFirstly

      public boolean playerOneMoveFirstly()
      Player 1 gets the "ideal" number of squares moved as determined by dice
      返回:
      true - it is time to move player 1

    • playerOneMoveSecondly

      public void playerOneMoveSecondly()
      Update state after executing move(Gamer, DirDice, MoveDice) method.

    • playerTwoDir

      public void playerTwoDir()
      Player 2 throws a die to obtain the direction of movement.

      Step1: Player 2 throws the dice. If the result is not `miss`, the state is updated to PLAYERTWO_MOVE.

      Step2: If the result is `miss`

      - If player 1 is stuck in the tar pit, update state to PLAYERTWO_DICE.

      - Otherwise, the state is updated to PLAYERONE_DICE.

    • playerTwoMoveFirstly

      public boolean playerTwoMoveFirstly()
      Player 2 gets the "ideal" number of squares moved as determined by dice
      返回:
      true - it is time to move player 2

    • playerTwoMoveSecondly

      public void playerTwoMoveSecondly()
      Update state after executing move(Gamer, DirDice, MoveDice) method.

    • doClearRecord

      public void doClearRecord()
      Clear the history of game score board

    • doPersistentRecord

      public void doPersistentRecord(Gamer player)
      Put the new winner's record into the total record.

      Step1: get name and moves of winner

      Step2: set name and moves into winner object

      Step3:

      - If there is no previous winners, just put this new winner in to ArrayList of previousGamers

      - If there are some previous winners, execute Gamers.mergeNewRecord(Gamer) and Gamers.sortAllRecords() methods

      Step4: execute doClearRecord() method

      Step5: put the total records into a file and store this file locally.

      参数:
      player - The winner of this round of game (Enter two names to start a new game is a new round)

    • getPreviousGamers

      public Gamers getPreviousGamers()
      get records of all previous winners
      返回:
      Records all previous winners
